issue.title: [Rust] Schema and DataType::Struct should use Vec<Rc<Field>>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2460](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2460). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we use Vec<Field> instead of Vec<Rc<Field>> which is resulting in having to clone fields in some use cases, which could be expensive for structs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2460?focusedCommentId=16782967) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This is no longer valid
